0011101111100111 0000100101000001 0 -> sum: 0100010100101000, cout: 0

1110010001001110 0000110001111001 1 -> sum: 1111000011001000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
